string.value: Now that Tsuri has #b#t04000153##k with him, will he be good at catching those fishes? I better go check him out...
Hah, I wound up having to catch for him. I'll need to get #b100 #t04000158#s#k from #b#o4230200##k.\n\n#t04000158# #b#c04000158##k/100
That bowl of rice covered in Poopa's eggs does not look enticing at all. Does it taste alright? I think I'll let others find out...
Check this out! I know you worked hard to get me #b#t04000153##k, but I was unable to catch #bPenguins#k because they were just too darn fast!
Have I grown really that old? Sigh...\r\nThis doesn't mean I'll stop here, though!
Can you catch #b#t04000158##k for me? If you were able to snatch #b#t04000153##k away from the penguins, then I'm sure you can pull this match off.
Alright, great choice. Gather up #b100 #t04000158#s#k, and I'll personally feed you with my new fresh gourmet dish made out of Poopa's eggs.
Once it's done, I'll make sure to feed you with this.
I'm going to make it right now, so just wait! Don't worry, this won't take long! The beauty of this dish is that it take very little time to prepare it!
I didn't think of this while making it, but ... what kind of eggs are these...? \r\nThe eggs are BLUE! A warm bowl of rice, covered in blue eggs... yuck, I feel like throwing up just imagining it...
I was expecting more in the mold of Salmon eggs, but... just because of a change in color, it totally makes this dish a turn-off.
I'm afraid, this may not be available at our restaurant. I know you worked hard to get these ingredients. I'm sorry. Here, the pay for your hard work. Look for a new menu sometime soon!
You didn't bring enough eggs for this!
